title: Mind Body Connection | Chiropractor in St Clair Shores, MI | Harper Chiropractic Center
description: Mind Body Connection in St Clair Shores, MI. Harper Chiropractic Center is your local Chiropractor in St Clair Shores serving all of your needs. Call us today at (586) 774-7171 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Whether we're driving a car, riding a bike, or trying to record a spare at our local bowling alley, our musculoskeletal system bases its decision-making on past history, that is, what it has learned before.
